languages.text: {n}Когитатор не реагирует на нажатие кнопок и поворот ручек: на экране по прежнему отображается то, что вы увидели, когда только подошли к машине.{/n}
{n}The cogitator does not react to the buttons being pushed and the handles being turned: the screen continues to display what you saw when you first approached the machine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когитатор не реагирует на нажатие кнопок и поворот ручек: на экране по прежнему отображается то, что вы увидели, когда только подошли к машине.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cogitator does not react on the buttons being pushed and the handles being turned: the screen continues to display what you saw when you approached the machine for the first time.{/n}
{n}The cogitator does not react on the buttons being pushed and the handles being turned: the screen continues to display what you saw when you approached the machine for the first time.{/n}
{n}The cogitator does not react to the buttons being pushed and the handles being turned: the screen continues to display what you saw when you first approached the machine.{/n}
{n}The cogitator does not react to the buttons being pushed and the handles being turned: the screen continues to display what you saw when you first approached the machine.{/n}
{n}The cogitator does not react to the buttons being pushed and the handles being turned: the screen continues to display what you saw when you first approached the machine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}无论是按下按键，还是转动手柄，沉思者都没有任何反应。屏幕上依然显示着你第一次接近这台机器时看到的信息。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator does not react to the buttons being pushed and the handles being turned: the screen continues to display what you saw when you first approached the machine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}无论是按下按键，还是转动手柄，思考器都没有任何反应。屏幕上依然显示着你第一次接近这台机器时看到的信息。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cogitador no responde cuando pulsas botones y giras manivelas: la pantalla sigue mostrando lo mismo que cuando te has acercado a la máquina por primera vez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator does not react to the buttons being pushed and the handles being turned: the screen continues to display what you saw when you first approached the machine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cogitador no responde cuando pulsas botones y giras manivelas: la pantalla sigue mostrando lo mismo que cuando te has acercado a la máquina por primera vez.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ボタンを押したりハンドルを回しても、考算機は反応しない。画面には、最初に機械に近づいた際に映っていたものが変わらず表示されている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator does not react to the buttons being pushed and the handles being turned: the screen continues to display what you saw when you first approached the machine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ボタンを押したりハンドルを回しても、考算機は反応しない。画面には、最初に機械に近づいた際に映っていたものが変わらず表示されている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Cogitator reagiert nicht auf gedrückte Tasten und gedrehte Räder: Der Bildschirm zeigt weiterhin dasselbe an wie vorhin, als du dich erstmals der Maschine genähert hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator does not react to the buttons being pushed and the handles being turned: the screen continues to display what you saw when you first approached the machine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Cogitator reagiert nicht auf gedrückte Tasten und gedrehte Räder: Der Bildschirm zeigt weiterhin dasselbe an wie vorhin, als du dich erstmals der Maschine genähert hast.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez beau appuyer sur des boutons et tirer des poignées, le cogitateur ne réagit pas. L'écran affiche toujours la même chose que quand vous vous êtes {mf|approché|approchée} de la machine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator does not react to the buttons being pushed and the handles being turned: the screen continues to display what you saw when you first approached the machine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez beau appuyer sur des boutons et tirer des poignées, le cogitateur ne réagit pas. L'écran affiche toujours la même chose que quand vous vous êtes {mf|approché|approchée} de la machine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Düğmelere basıp kolları çeviriyorsun ancak kavramsayar oralı olmuyor. Makineye yaklaştığında seni karşılayan görüntü, ekranı işgal etmeyi sürdürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator does not react to the buttons being pushed and the handles being turned: the screen continues to display what you saw when you first approached the machine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Düğmelere basıp, kolları çeviriyorsun ancak kavramsayar oralı olmuyor. Yaklaştığında seni karşılayan görüntü, ekranı işgal etmeye devam ediyor.{/n}
